mapper.select: /*product.productInfoListAll1*/ SELECT * FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE PRDTYPE = #{codeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY PRDIDX

/*product.productInfoListAll*/ SELECT PRDIDX ,PRDCTGR ,PRDNAME ,PRDPRC ,PRDVIEW ,PRDIMG ,PRDTYPE ,TOTALCNT
FROM ( SELECT PRDIDX ,PRDCTGR ,PRDNAME ,PRDPRC ,PRDVIEW ,PRDIMG ,PRDTYPE ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRDIDX) AS NUMROW ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALCNT FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE PRDTYPE = #{codeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*10 + 1 AND #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*10 ORDER BY PRDIDX
/*product.productTotalAll*/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE PRDTYPE = #{codeType}
/*product.productInfoList1*/ SELECT * FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE PRDCTGR = #{prdCtgr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRDTYPE = #{codeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY PRDIDX

/*product.productInfoList*/ SELECT PRDIDX ,PRDCTGR ,PRDNAME ,PRDPRC ,PRDVIEW ,PRDIMG ,PRDTYPE FROM ( SELECT PRDIDX ,PRDCTGR ,PRDNAME ,PRDPRC ,PRDVIEW ,PRDIMG ,PRDTYPE ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRDIDX) AS NUMROW ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALCNT FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE PRDCTGR = #{prdCtgr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRDTYPE = #{codeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*10 + 1 AND #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*10 ORDER BY PRDIDX
/*product.productInfoprdIdx*/ SELECT PRDIDX FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE PRDCTGR = #{prdCtgr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRDTYPE = #{codeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND nvl(TO_NUMBER(MAX(PRDIDX)+1),0)
/*product.productInfoView*/ SELECT * FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE PRDIDX = #{prdIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
